title: Total War: ROME II Emperor Edition Free Download
description:
Get Total War: ROME II Emperor Edition PC game for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRiP
Emperor Edition is the definitive edition of ROME II, featuring an improved politics system, overhauled building chains, rebalanced battles and improved visuals in both campaign and battle. Emperor Edition contains all free feature updates since its release in 2013, which includes bug fixes, balancing, Twitch.tv integration , touchscreen, and Mac compatibility.
In addition, a free DLC campaign pack ‘The Imperator Augustus’ is included, which follows the aftermath of Caesar’s demise. The Imperator Augustus Campaign Pack and all Emperor Edition updates are free, via automatic update, to all existing ROME II owners.

system_requirements.Processor: 2 GHz Intel Dual Core processor / 2.6 GHz Intel Single Core processor
system_requirements.Graphics: 512 MB DirectX 9.0c compatible card (shader model 3, vertex texture fetch support).
